rewritten_resume:

implementation_notes: Reframed the SUMMARY to emphasize problem-solving, teamwork, and enhancing user experiences, aligning with Microsoft's mission and values.
Reorganized the CORE SKILLS to highlight frontend and backend experiences and added Kubernetes and CI/CD exposure.
Modified the PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE and HACKATHONS sections to emphasize engineering principles, problem-solving, and collaboration.
De-emphasized AI/ML technologies as per advisor recommendations.
unaddressed_items: Specific experience in C#, Java, Golang, Kotlin, or C++ could not be added due to lack of supporting information in the resume.
Details on accessibility in UI development could not be added due to lack of evidence in the resume.
